content: in this legal case the court has made a decision regarding the costs duration and resolution the total costs amount to 666 euros which the second heir is responsible for covering the procedure lasted for 9 months and 15 days the final resolution involves the distribution of assets and funds including real estate properties a personal bank account and an unpaid pension benefit there are four heirs and according to the law each heir is entitled to 14 of the assets however an agreement has been made and the second heir will receive all the goods while the three daughters will have rights to use the real estate properties the decision was based on the inheritance act and the civil procedure act the court received a death certificate and initiated the succession proceedings the court assessed the value of the estate deducted funeral costs and determined the court fee the final judgment will be forwarded to the land registry for registration the deceased son will need a certificate of the final order to access the pension benefits if the parties want to appeal the decision they have 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing sufficient copies to the other party the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court and must include the order being appealed the grounds for the appeal and whether it is being challenged in whole or in part the appeal must be clear and include all necessary information and if not it may be dismissed the appeal must be lodged by a lawyer who has passed the state lawyers examination and the court fee must be paid unless there are grounds for exemption or deferment if the court fee is not paid within the specified time limit the appeal will be considered withdrawn the appeal can also be sent by registered post on the last day of the appeal period

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estates, funds on personal bank account, unpaid pension benefits
